snippet: Because of several factors, including increased television coverage, improved technology and the resurgence of Tiger Woods, golf betting is on the rise.
abstract: Several factors have contributed to a rise in golf betting, including increased television coverage, improved technology and the resurgence of Tiger Woods; this year's Masters could be the most wagered-on golf event in history.
lead_paragraph: Because of several factors, including increased television coverage, improved technology and the resurgence of Tiger Woods, golf betting is on the rise.

headline.seo: Masters Is a Major Event for Bettors, Too
headline.main: For Bettors, Masters Is a Major Event, Too
headline.print_headline: As Popularity Soars, So Does the Wagering
